Package YAMLParser

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Lexer
    The lexer is responsible for converting the passed yml in string format into a stream of Tokens.
    Token
    This class represents a single building block of an YAML-File.
    Util
    Contains Utility-Functions like File-I/O operations.
    YAMLParser
    This class represents the YML-Dataformat as a tree structure and offers the ability to load the datastructure from a given YML-File.
    YAMLParser.YMLNode
    A yml node contains either a value or children.
    YAMLParser.YMLSection
    A sections contains multiple top-level-scoped yml-nodes.
    YAMLParser.YMLTree
    Represents the top-level datastructure, that holds multiple sections.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    Token.TokenType
    Enum to describe the type of a token.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    MalformedYMLException
    This exception is thrown when it is attempted to barse bad YML input, or when the YML that is parsed does not follow the YML-Grammar.
